attributes.action: Allow farmers to grow hemp without restriction.
attributes.additional_details: Remove all restrictions on growing industrial hemp. Although the industrial strains of the plant have no psychoactive potential, the absurd level of control has effectively destroyed its value as an agricultural crop.  With that we have lost the most efficient producer of biomass in the natural world, the strongest natural fibre, a better fabric than cotton, a better paper than wood and one of the most ecologically important agricultural and industrial activities on the planet.
